summary: Retextures Chauruses with a many different colors (like a rainbow)
descriptionHtml:
My first retexture for Skyrim. Chauruses look colorful like a rainbow. I also added an eye on the top of its head too make it look even weirder, and I colored part of the mouth red. The only thing I didn't change were the eyes.

Bugs
None so far

Q and A

Q;Does the retexture affect ALL Chauruses?
A:Most likely, but I wasn't able to check yet if it works on all. It works for
normal ones and Chaurus Reaper
Q:Was anything special added to the mod?
A:Yes, I added a 10 gold death drop for normal Chauruses and 30 gold for Chaurus Reapers
(please look at photos)

Remember too endorse my mod if you liked it.

Also check out my other mods

Werewolf Power Shouts, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54020/?
M'raaj-Dar, The Cheydinhal Sanctuary Merchant, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53493/?
Friendly and Respectful Player Dialogue, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53421/?
German Version, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53462/?

And my best one so far,
Mean and Rude Player Dialogue, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53371/?
German Version, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53456/?

Thanks to Dahaka71 for translating 2 of my mods
author: DiscordLol
